name: Puppy Black, Puppy White
description:
Collect Bones, Squish Enemies and Save Kittens in a Partially-Hidden World!

Some people says dogs can only see in Black and White, but what if they could see in Black or White? 

You never realized the value of colours until they were gone. Or floors. Though, I suppose they are still there .... hidden to most puppies.

Submission to the Black & White Jam: https://itch.io/jam/bw-jam. Theme: 'You only realize the value of something when it's gone'

Controls: WASD to move, Space to jump!
